name: Colors Skip-Wheel Challenge.
description:
Take control over your urges to tap the screen and you might be able to play this game! The turning wheels keep changing their color .. the banner on the top will tell you what color you can’t touch at each moment .. You need to tap on each circle until the number inside it is zero and it will evaporate! the catch is you can’t tap on the circle that has the forbidden color which is displayed on the top banner.
Each time you destroy all the wheel you will move on to the next level, where you will need to tap additional time on each circle to destroy it . How many levels you can go ? depends on how fast or slow your reflexes. How good of peripheral vision you have
Enjoy the dazzling illuminating colorful background with the dancing music, compete with your friends on the leaderboard see what level they can reach, and compete with your friends on the leaderboard!

This game is a part of three game series download them from AppStore
Colors Skip, Tile Challenge, Wheel Challenge and the Triangle Challenge!
